articles.title: Dozens dead in village attack in southwestern Niger
articles.description: Officials say up to 60 people killed in latest violent incident in Niger's 'tri-border' zone with Burkina Faso and Mali.
articles.content:
Dozens of people have been killed in an attack this week on a village in southwestern Nigers Tillaberi region, according to local sources quoted by news agencies.

articles.description: Six attackers, two police officers and a soldier killed during gun battles, local governor says.
articles.content:
